name: Neue - Dark Tumblr Dash Theme
description: A dark Tumblr dashboard theme with a subtle textured background.
additional_info:
Originally posted at: http://deejayl.tumblr.com/post/62510346196/dash-theme-neue - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - CURRENT v2.0.5 6 May 2015: Changed post icon colour from Tumblr-blue to light-grey. Tried changing new post notification ticker; it's injected into the live page so the overrides can't seem to grab it after the initial page-load. Isn't a theme-killer for me, hopefully doesn't bother you lot too much either. Display:none;'d the new "rapid recommendations" feature they're testing. - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - v2.0.4 4 Mar 2015: Get those sidebar hovers greyscale again. Thanks for often changing your code, Tumblr ¬.¬ v2.0.3 16 Jan 2015: Aaaaah the .chrome and .blue classes are used on the reblog popup submit button too and making them pale made them invisible. Altered to fix. v2.0.2 15 Jan 2015: Removed code for top pagination as those links are no longer on the dash. Updated bottom prev/next page links, as they have new ".chrome" and ".blue" styles. v2.0.1 14 Nov 2014: Updated blue prev/next page links to match grey and white colour scheme where possible. Can't do much about the arrows, they're images and replacing them would be a paiiiiin. v2.0.0 31 Oct 2014: Version two-point-oh! Freshly re-coded for the new Tumblr layout. v1.0.8 31 Aug 2014: Complete re-haul. Newly coded from scratch—all legacy CSS is gone and now has a lighter footprint. Recommended Blogs and Radar have been hidden. Rounded background containers removed to further simplify the theme. Search box simplified to match. v1.0.7 13 Aug 2014: Remove recurring blue gradient under Recommended Blogs. v1.0.6 18 Jul 2014: Tweaks to re-remove occurrence of blue on content container after Tumblr changed their code. v1.0.5 12 Apr 2014: Re-remove sidebar gradients after Tumblr changed their code. v1.0.4 25 Oct 2013: More tweaks to account for new Tumblr code. Removed theme support for any pages OTHER than the Dashboard, things were getting messy. v1.0.3 17 Oct 2013: Small update for some changes Tumblr have made to the design. Update background tile to http://subtlepatterns.com/classy-fabric/ v1.0.2 01 Oct 2013: Uploaded background image to imgur lest I get emails from Dropbox re: exceeding the bandwidth limit. Again. v1.0.1 29 Sep 2013: There are apparently actual people using this (cue minor panic), so... update!
  • Styled the auto pagination loader (I had it turned off, d'oh). Is now more in theme with the, well, theme.
  • Styled Inbox, Help, Settings pages
v1.0.0 29 Sep 2013: Original release
